## Orientation enumeration

Specifies page orientation.

```csharp
public enum Orientation
```

## Values

| Name | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Portrait | `1` | Portrait page orientation (narrow and tall). |
| Landscape | `2` | Landscape page orientation (wide and short). |
